title: ppm to ppb conversion | number conversion
text: ppm and ppb are defined as: 1ppm = 1/106 = 10-6 1ppb = 1/109 = 10-9 So 1ppm = 1000ppb The number of parts-per billion xppb is equal to the number of parts-per million xppm multiplied by 1000: xppb = xppm ⋅ 1000 Example: 7ppm is equal to 7000ppb: xppb = 7ppm ⋅ 1000 = 7000ppb
